mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, SETTLE_TYPE, REPAY_CAPITAL, REPAY_INTEREST, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, OTHER_FEE, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, LATE_FEE, SETTLE_CAPITAL, SETTLE_TOTAL_AMOUNT, SETTLE_AFTER_CAPITAL, SETTLE_START_PERIOD, SETTLE_END_PERIOD, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_STATUS, APPLY_END_DATE, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_settle (ID, APP_ID, SETTLE_TYPE, REPAY_CAPITAL, REPAY_INTEREST, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, OTHER_FEE, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT, LATE_FEE, SETTLE_CAPITAL, SETTLE_TOTAL_AMOUNT, SETTLE_AFTER_CAPITAL, SETTLE_START_PERIOD, SETTLE_END_PERIOD, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_STATUS, APPLY_END_DATE, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lateFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settleCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settleTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settleAfterCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settleStartPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleEndPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_apply_settle
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_TYPE = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_INTEREST = #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OTHER_FEE = #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LATE_FEE = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SETTLE_CAPITAL = #{settleCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SETTLE_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{settleTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SETTLE_AFTER_CAPITAL = #{settleAfterCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SETTLE_START_PERIOD = #{settleStartPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SETTLE_END_PERIOD = #{settleEndPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_END_DATE = #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_apply_settle set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_TYPE = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REPAY_INTEREST = #{repayInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REPAY_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{repayOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OTHER_FEE = #{otherFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OTHER_OVERDUE_AMOUNT = #{otherOverdueAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LATE_FEE = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SETTLE_CAPITAL = #{settleCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SETTLE_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{settleTotalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SETTLE_AFTER_CAPITAL = #{settleAfterCapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SETTLE_START_PERIOD = #{settleStartPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SETTLE_END_PERIOD = #{settleEndPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_END_DATE = #{applyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.APP_ID as appId, d.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, b.NAME as custName, b.ID_NO as idNo, a.SETTLE_TOTAL_AMOUNT as settleAmount, a.CREATE_DATE as applyDate, e.DICT_DATA_NAME as applyStatus, a.APPLY_COMMENT as applyComment, c.NAME_ as taskName, f.ACCOUNT_NAME as assignee from T_APPLY_SETTLE a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join ACT_RU_TASK c on a.PROC_INST_ID = c.PROC_INST_ID_ left join T_SIGN_CONTRACT d on a.APP_ID = d.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA e on a.APPLY_STATUS = e.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_ACCOUNT f on c.ASSIGNEE_ = f.ACCOUNT_ID where a.CREATE_ID = #{createId} and a.SETTLE_TYPE = #{settleType}
